title: The year journalism fights back in the courts
description: In the epilogue to his insightful Collision of Power, former Washington Post editor Marty Baron argued in 2023 that “the legacy media’s legal strategy deserves a rethink.” Baron imagined a day when news organizations would need to step outside the confines of traditional journalistic instincts and fight back against the near-constant attacks on our integrity....
